SuffixLookups.summary: Represents a colletion of SuffixLookup objects.

LJCDeserialize.summary: Deserializes from the specified XML file.

remarks.para: If the requested XML file does not exist, a default file will be created from the Suffix XML file and 48 standard lookup values.

Add.summary: Creates and adds the object from the supplied values.
Add.returns: A reference to the added item.

LJCSearchLookupName.summary: Finds and returns the object that contains the supplied values.

LJCSearchLSoundex.summary: Finds and returns the object that contains the supplied values.

LJCSearchPSoundex.summary: Finds and returns the object that contains the supplied values.
